properties.name: videoUseFilePath
properties.description: Use a file path for the input video. Uncheck to use binary data.

properties.name: analysisPrompt
properties.default:
You are a professional video analyzer. Your task is to analyze the provided video and select the single tag from the following list that best describes the video's primary setting or environment: 

store, parking-garage, warehouse, office, kitchen, bathroom, gym, classroom, restaurant, hospital, street, parking-lot, park, beach, farm, construction, dockyard, fair, stadium, road, pool, salon, hotel, bowling, city, hiking, snow, event, boat, airport, zoo

Respond only with the chosen tag. Do not add any explanation, punctuation, or other text.
properties.description: The prompt instructing the AI on how to analyze the video.

properties.name: frame_count
properties.description: Number of frames to sample from the video for analysis.
